alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Johnson; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Martin, Johnson, northern Knott, Floyd, central Breathitt, northwestern Pike and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 815 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chestnut to Lakesville to near Guage to Press. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chestnut, Whitehouse, River, Offutt, Boons Camp, Wells Chapel, Williamsport, Tutor Key, Bobbs and Nippa around 820 PM EDT. Wells, Riceville, Stidham, Tomahawk, Ballot, Davisport and Oil Springs around 825 PM EDT. Inez, Fredville, Bonanza, Ordway, Add, Milo, Gapville, Job, Dobson and Swamp Branch around 830 PM EDT. Vail, Cliff, Bays Branch, Orchard, Calf Creek, East Point, Elmrock, Gunlock, Oaklawn Estates and Andy around 835 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Prestonsburg, Warfield, Hode, Lancer, Corn Fork Hollow, Handshoe, Blue River, Pyramid, Mid, Dock, Martin, Dicks Creek, Alphoretta, Arkansas, Endicott, Bosco, Betty, Beaver Junction, Hippo, Bolyn, Estill, Wayland, Allen, Dana, Banner, Porter Junction, Garret, Ivel, Glo, McCombs, Drift, Justell, McDowell, Minnie, Betsy Layne, East McDowell, Harold, Hunter, Aluba and Orkney. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 73 and 76. Kentucky Highway 3 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 4. Kentucky Highway 3 in Johnson County Kentucky Highway 3 in Martin County between mile markers 1 and 9. Kentucky Highway 80 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 14. Kentucky Highway 80 in Knott County between mile markers 12 and 20. U.S. Highway 23 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 21. U.S. Highway 23 in Johnson County between mile markers 0 and 16. U.S. Highway 23 in Pike County between mile markers 31 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
